bug.author: TOsmanov
bug.summary: Display names of selected files when creating a new task
bug.description:
When creating a task, files downloaded from a my computer are displayed simply as the number selected files. It would be more convenient to see names of selected files added using area “Click or drag files to this area”. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/54434686/70423003-c2d20780-1a7d-11ea-97c8-a1495ea5069f.PNG></denchmark-link>
For example, this area after downloading at least one file may change to a list of files.
